azure_blob_storage_endpoint_domain_name.title: Endpoint Domain Name
azure_blob_storage_endpoint_domain_name.description: This is Azure Blob Storage endpoint domain name. Leave default value (or leave it empty if run container from command line) to use Microsoft native from example.

azure_blob_storage_container_name.title: Azure blob storage container (Bucket) Name
azure_blob_storage_container_name.description: The name of the Azure blob storage container. If not exists - will be created automatically. May be empty, then will be created automatically airbytecontainer+timestamp

azure_blob_storage_account_name.title: Azure Blob Storage account name
azure_blob_storage_account_name.description: The account's name of the Azure Blob Storage.

azure_blob_storage_account_key.title: Azure Blob Storage account key
azure_blob_storage_account_key.description: The Azure blob storage account key.

azure_blob_storage_output_buffer_size.title: Azure Blob Storage output buffer size (Megabytes)
azure_blob_storage_output_buffer_size.description: The amount of megabytes to buffer for the output stream to Azure. This will impact memory footprint on workers, but may need adjustment for performance and appropriate block size in Azure.

flattening.title: Normalization (Flattening)
flattening.description: Whether the input json data should be normalized (flattened) in the output CSV. Please refer to docs for details.

loading_method.title: Loading Method
loading_method.description: Loading method used to send select the way data will be uploaded to Azure Blob Storage.

oneOf.title: GCS Staging
oneOf.description:
Writes large batches of records to a file, uploads the file to GCS, then uses 
COPY INTO table
to upload the file. Recommended for large production workloads for better speed and scalability.

bucket_name.title: GCS Bucket Name
bucket_name.description: The name of the GCS bucket.

bucket_path.description: Directory under the GCS bucket where data will be written.

bucket_region.title: GCS Bucket Region
bucket_region.description: The region of the GCS bucket.

keep_files_in_gcs-bucket.description: This upload method is supposed to temporary store records in GCS bucket. What do you want to do with data in GCS bucket when migration has finished?
keep_files_in_gcs-bucket.title: GCS tmp files afterward processing
keep_files_in_gcs-bucket.default: Delete all tmp files from GCS
enum: Delete all tmp files from GCS
Keep all tmp files in GCS

hmac_key_access_id.description: HMAC key access ID. When linked to a service account, this ID is 61 characters long; when linked to a user account, it is 24 characters long.
hmac_key_access_id.title: HMAC Key Access ID

hmac_key_secret.description: The corresponding secret for the access ID. It is a 40-character base-64 encoded string.
hmac_key_secret.title: HMAC Key Secret

oneOf.title: S3 Staging
oneOf.description:
Writes large batches of records to a file, uploads the file to S3, then uses 
COPY INTO table
to upload the file. Recommended for large production workloads for better speed and scalability.

s3_endpoint.title: Endpoint
s3_endpoint.description: This is your S3 endpoint url.(if you are working with AWS S3, just leave empty).

bucket_name.title: S3 Bucket Name
bucket_name.description: The name of the S3 bucket.

bucket_path.description: Directory under the S3 bucket where data will be written.

bucket_region.title: S3 Bucket Region
bucket_region.description: The region of the S3 bucket.

keep_files_in_s3-bucket.description: This upload method is supposed to temporary store records in S3 bucket. What do you want to do with data in S3 bucket when migration has finished?
keep_files_in_s3-bucket.title: S3 tmp files afterward processing
keep_files_in_s3-bucket.default: Delete all tmp files from S3
enum: Delete all tmp files from S3
Keep all tmp files in S3

access_key_id.description: The access key id to access the S3 bucket. Airbyte requires Read and Write permissions to the given bucket.
access_key_id.title: S3 Key Id

secret_access_key.description: The corresponding secret to the access key id.
secret_access_key.title: S3 Access Key
